content.text:
# Rajeshwari Datta

| birth_place = Kolkata, India
| nationality = Indian
| occupation = Actor
| yearsactive = 2014–present
| known for = Jamai Raja,
Tujhse Hai Raabta, Meri Hanikarak Biwi
}}
Rajeshwari Datta (born September 22, 1988) is an Indian actor known for her work in Indian cinema and television. She is known for her roles in the TV series Jamai Raja and Tujhse Hai Raabta, and for Zee TV.
Early life
Rajeshwari Datta was born on September 22, 1988, in Kolkata. She completed her schooling in Jorhat, Assam, and graduated from Jogamaya Devi College, Kolkata.
Filmography
Film
* Devdoot (2004)
* Meghor sobi (2014)
* Madhu Lagan
